channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: Create a Network-Attached Storage (NAS) with Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 and NVMe to SATA Adapter
item.description: Build a DIY NAS using Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5, NVMe to SATA adapter, and OpenMediaVault with RAID 5.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
